backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister implementing user profiles, contacts, and transaction history with authorization checks and in-memory storage.
backend/migration.mo: Defines migration types and a no-op migration function returning old state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of frontend source files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining color variables and base styling for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST.md: Smoke test checklist describing core user flows to verify after deployment.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication states, profile loading, routing, and page rendering within the layout.
Provides a sign-in/sign-out button tied to Internet Identity with login state handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/PrincipalDi: Displays the user's principal with optional truncation and a copy-to-clipboard button.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog prompting new users to enter and save their profile name.
frontend/src/components/contacts/Contact: Dialog for adding or editing a contact with validation and save/update mutations.
frontend/src/components/errors/AppErrorB: Error boundary component that catches UI errors and shows a reload option.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Application layout with header, authentication controls, navigation, and page container.
frontend/src/components/layout/WalletLog: Renders the wallet logo and app name using branding constants.
frontend/src/components/wallet/Recipient: Popover-based contact picker allowing users to select a saved contact as a recipient.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInfinityCoinBalanc: Fetches the user's Infinity Coin balance using react-query and an authenticated ledger client.
frontend/src/hooks/useInfinityLedger.ts: Initializes and exposes an authenticated Infinity Ledger client based on the user's Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout actions, and an Identity context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React-query hooks for user profiles, contacts, and transaction history using a backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes with a cosmic aesthetic.
frontend/src/lib/branding.ts: Exports application and token name constants.
frontend/src/lib/icpAccountId.ts: Implements derivation of ICP account IDs from principals using SHA-224 and CRC32.
frontend/src/lib/infinityLedger/client.t: Defines ICRC-1 ledger client types, IDL, and a function to create an authenticated Infinity Ledger actor.
frontend/src/lib/infinityLedger/config.t: Stores the Infinity Coin ledger canister ID.
frontend/src/lib/infinityLedger/index.ts: Re-exports Infinity Ledger client utilities and types.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility functions for class merging, principal truncation, and timestamp formatting.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Provides validation for recipients and amounts, plus helpers to format balances and convert amounts to e8s.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ContactsPage.tsx: Loads, displays, creates, edits, and deletes saved contacts with UI dialogs and error/loading states.
frontend/src/pages/ContractsPage.tsx: Allows authenticated users to simulate canister method calls with JSON arguments and displays results.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Shows the user’s Infinity Coin balance and provides quick navigation actions.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Displays locally recorded transaction history with loading, error, and refresh handling.
frontend/src/pages/ReceivePage.tsx: Shows the user’s principal for receiving Infinity Coin and supports copying it to the clipboard.
frontend/src/pages/SendPage.tsx: Implements the Infinity Coin send flow with validation, transfer execution via the ICRC-1 ledger, and UI step handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from the URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, shadows, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s ledger-integration state, requirements, and existing features for Infinity Coin ICRC-1 support.
